resources.string: Latest available image of the day has already been loaded
New Image of the day has been loaded
Sorry, but %s cannot be displayed yet\nURL = %s
This allows to transfer the JSON metadata files and thumbnail images via Socket to a listener Python script running on a remote machine.
FunInSpace could not load a new daily image. Most likely, the API rate limit has been exceeded.
FunInSpace needs to have the YouTube App installed on your phone in order to play YouTube videos. Please install the YouTube App from the App Store
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
Hires images and videos only load if Wifi connection is available.
Please enable TLS v1 in Settings > General
Fall back to lower resolution image if NASA has a bad link for hires image, which happens from time to time
You have currently disabled the load of new daily images. Please change your settings to avoid missing the daily image.
Could not find any suitable e-mail client on your device
Could not create a thumbnail image for this Vimeo video
You did not set any FunInSpace Wallpaper yet, so there\'s nothing to restore

You have set a new wallpaper. Saving your current Wallpaper, so that you can restore this by using \'Restore Original Wallpaper\' in Main Menu.\nNote, that this is not possible any more, if you deinstall the App before restoring

A WiFi connection is needed to load video or hires images to save bandwidth. You do not have a WiFi connection currently. You can adjust your settings to allow loading video or hires images without WiFi as well. Should the setting be changed now? You can change this setting at any time.
Image \'%s\' is your current wallpaper. This will not be deleted.
Do you want to set \'%s\' as your current wallpaper? If you select NO, this will just be added to the list of wallpapers available for shuffle
Please have a long click on the image in fullscreen mode, which allows to select a wallpaper range. Using this menu does not currently allow to set a wallpaper
Removing FunInSpace Wallpaper and reverting to your original image…

FunInSpace does now initialize and you can choose to load a bunch of more historical image data. You have no wifi active currently. Do you want to load the data anyway? You can decide to load at any time using Resync
FunInSpace does now initialize and you can choose to load a bunch of historical data to have some images available. You can sync at any later time as well.
You do not have any active network connection. Please start the app again with an active network.

Do you want to refresh your image list with my (Herbert\'s) Dropbox informations? Images, that you have deleted, will not be loaded again. If you want to reload these deleted images, click "FULL SYNC".
Search in explanation text in addition to title only
Just a test email sent by the FunInSpace App. The attachment contains a debugging logfile. TIP: Add yourself as .cc to see, what has been sent.
==TIP==\nLong Press on image for wallpaper selection
Read out the explanation text for the image while watching the image in fullscreen. The context menu also offers a \'read out\' option.
Quality of newly saved wallpaper images. Images that have already been saved are not changed by this setting.
Choose the format of date you like to be shown in the list of images.

Keep local copy of hires images on your device.\nNote: Videos will always be streamed and never get stored locally. Currently, this is limited to 20 percent of free available storage, automatic deletion done if more memory is used. To be configurable later…
Use lower color resolution Thumbnail pictures to save memory. Check, if you see any difference in the list.
Image of today already loaded. Next image available in %.1f hours

Schedule has been set to change the wallpaper at full hours selected by you in setting "Shuffle Times" randomly from those wallpapers, that you have currently selected. Between 23:00 and 06:00, no shuffle is done.

Schedule has been set to change the wallpaper at selected full hours. \nIMPORTANT: You currently do not have the minimum of 2 FunInSpace wallpapers selected, so that no shuffle will take place for now. As soon as you select the minimum of 2 wallpapers, the shuffle function will start. In "Shuffle Times" setting you can determine, at which hours a shuffle should be done.
A new image is available, but you do not have an active network connection. Maybe flightmode is enabled?
You do not have an active network connection to load the image or video. Maybe flightmode is enabled?

Image for MP4 by Gregor Cresnar, https://www.flaticon.com/authors/gregor-cresnar 
Rocket icon from https://openclipart.org under Creative Commons Zero 1.0 Public Domain License 
Vector graphics from https://material.io/icons 
Sounds by https://notificationsounds.com
These settings are meant for testing and debugging purposes only.
Currently only available with Android 5 or higher - shuffle is done at selected full hours, if switched on.
Select the hours at which a wallpaper shuffle should be done.

Currently only available with Android 5 or higher. Load information about the daily image, even if the App is not started on that day. This helps to avoid missing images, because these get loaded at next start of the app.
This notifies you, that a new APOD information has been loaded. Switch this on, if you like to hear "new apod" on successful information load.
This defines the maximum percentage of the current free internal memory in percent, that is used for storing hires images locally. If reaching the limit, automatic deletions take place.
* Reading of explanations has been changed. Instead of reading the explanation when expanding the text, the explanation is now read while viewing the image. You can disable the reading in settings.
* The app does now load infos about the daily image in background by default, even if it is not running. You can disable this in in settings.
